explain.yolo: yolo的版本。本项目现在有yolov3,yolov3-tiny两个版本
explain.track_number: 需要追踪的摄像头的数量

explain_e.cv2_flag: control the opening of the opencv window
explain_e.map_location_flag: control map_location_flag_explain ,under windows, the value is true
explain_e.bad_time: bad time,the unit is in seconds
explain_e.left_time: left time,the unit is in seconds
explain_e.need: objects to detect，the Numbers are in YOLO3/cfg/coco.names
explain_e.yolo: yolo versions。The project now has yolov3,yolov3-tiny versions
